title: Sterile needle and syringe exchange program established
context: [ยง325-112] Sterile needle and syringe exchange program established. The director of health may establish a sterile needle and syringe exchange program. The program shall be administered by the director or the director&rsquo;s designees. The director is authorized to designate private providers of service to operate the program. [L 1992, c 152, pt of ยง2]
